price: 71. Nous le sauvâmes ainsi que Loth, et les (conduisîmes) vers la terre que Nous avons bénie pour tous les êtres de l’Univers.
arabic: وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wanajjaynāhu walūṭan ilā al-arḍi allatī bāraknā fīhā lil'ʿālamīna
